title: how to change new client language.korean to english...
body: thanks everyone...i play korean region server.

replies.body: Each riot support region has its own set of languages that it supports.  Per our[ supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) guide, NA currently only supports English.  You may also be using a client that is not supported, and recommend downloading the correct client [here](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).  Let me know if that clears things up!
